channel.title: Npc Dialouge
channel.description: Im trying to add some quest to my server and id like to add dialouges to my npcs. No i dont mean above head writing. Thats easy, i mean when u talk to them they talk back in text area. Can someone tell me how to add those?

item.title: Npc Dialouge
item.dc:creator: @r3d_th3m3 r3d_th3m3
item.description:
@r3d_th3m3 wrote:

I have never tried this but…

You would probably make a void for it
with the whole sendQuest(“blah blah blah”);

Then put the void in the case id of the npc.

case ####:
sendQuest("blah blah blah");
sendQuest("blah blah blah");
sendQuest("blah blah blah");
sendQuest("blah blah blah");

Something like that I’m guessing

Read full topic
